metadata.synopsis: The player reads the plaque outside Nightsong's chamber. It instructs them to kill Nightsong in order to become a Dark Justiciar

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Spill the blood of Selûne and rise a warrior of Shar.*
0.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player didn't already know Nightsong was a living beingNodeContext: The text of a plaque, instructing initiates in a sharran rite.
